Articles.Content:
Greetings all,

Fairly new to KSP. I know I'm very late to the party, but it seems like I have a condition that prevents me from playing games early in their life cycle lol. Not sure! Anyway, I play on an older laptop, so not sure how well KSP2 will run, might just stay with 1.

What really draws me to this game (apart from the space operations component) are the mods! So many talented mod makers doing so many cool things with the game is really hard to resist. Big props to the modders!
Welcome to the forum @Trask!
